attributes.action: Make it mandatory to include "None of the Above" on voting slips
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present it is only possilbe to vote for the following:

 
1. the person who you believe will absolutely represent all of your beliefs. (Probably does not exist)


2. the person who you feel represents the best of a bad bunch. (Damage limitation exercise). 
 

The only other alternative is to either "spoil" your voting slip or not vote at all.


In order to determine the mood of the nation and find out exactly what the electorate feels about the countrys politicians, make it mandatory to include the choice "None of the Above" on voting slips.


This would allow a more accurate statistical record to be be compiled that reflects the true feelings of the electorate about politicians and party politics..
